GSD.description:
gfs2: Fix use-after-free in gfs2_glock_shrink_scan

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.45 by commit a61156314b66456ab6a291ed5deba1ebd002ab3c. For more details please see the references link.
